sections.text: Purpose. The General Assembly finds that the State must encourage and promote the retention and expansion of existing businesses and industry within the State and recruit and attract new businesses and industry to the State by providing businesses with ready access to the capital and incentives needed to stimulate economic activity and create new jobs.

sections.text: Powers of the Department. The Department, in addition to those powers granted under the Civil Administrative Code of Illinois, is granted and shall have all the powers necessary or convenient to administer the program established under this Act and to carry out and effectuate the purposes and provisions of this Act, including, but not limited to, the power and authority to:

sections.heading: Annual report. On or before July 1 of each year, the Department shall submit to the General Assembly and the Governor a report on the program established under this Act
sections.text: The report shall include information on the number of agreements that were entered into under this Act during the preceding calend

sections.heading: Statutory exemptions. Awards of economic incentives made pursuant to this Act are exempt from
sections.text:
the
Corporate Accountability for Tax Expenditures Act,
the Illinois Works Jobs Program Act, and Section 45 of the State Finance Act, and any rules adopted under those authorities. In addition, non-competitive awards of economic incentives made pursuant to this Act are exempt from the public notice of funding opportunity (NOFO), merit review, audit, and grant payment method provisions of the Grant Accountability and Transparency Act (GATA) and the corresponding GATA rules associated with NOFOs, merit reviews, audits, and grant payment methods.

sections.heading: Vendor diversity report.  Each applicant shall, no later than April 15 of each taxable year for which an agreement under this Act between the applicant and the Department is in effect, report on the diversity of the vendors used by the applicant
sections.text: The report shall be published on the Department's web
